category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ARM_display_genealogy
preference.preference_description: Activates the display genealogy performance transaction. This measures the elapsed time from the selection of the superseded item to when the genealogy is displayed. Valid Values: * ON: Enables performance monitoring of the display genealogy performance transaction. * OFF: Suppresses performance monitoring of the display genealogy performance transaction.
